snippet.title: DRAGON QUEST XI S: Echoes of an Elusive Age - Definitive Age - Overview Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Embark on the journey of a young hero and his endearing companions on a quest to save the world of Erdrea. DRAGON QUEST XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age - Definitive Edition includes the original adventure with added content of visiting past DRAGON QUEST worlds, story quests, and more. Available today on Nintendo Switch family of consoles.

DRAGON QUEST XI S: Echoes of Elusive Age - Definitive Edition is Available Now! - https://bit.ly/2K8iqON

#NintendoSwitch #DragonQuest #DragonQuestXIS 

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
